abstract: Headlines paint a picture of the dark and gloomy earnings season
snippet: Headlines paint a picture of the dark and gloomy earnings season
lead_paragraph: Actually, I read the news Tuesday, but I was traveling and unable to post. All of these headlines come from the Jan. 27 Marketplace section of The Wall Street Journal — the same day John Thain offered his lame defense for remodeling his office and Citigroup decided not to buy that new corporate jet after all. It’s brutal out there.

headline.main: I Read the News Today, Oh Boy….
